name: Blundstone Winter Chisel Toe 1391 Boots - Unisex
description: A winter version of the classic chisel-toe Blunnie, this boot is completely waterproof (including the elastic gore panels) with sealed seams. Lightweight synthetic insulation is sandwiched between the premium leather upper and a soft leather lining for a warm, luxurious feel, and a cozy sheepskin footbed provides additional warmth and comfort for the coldest days.Premium leather upper.Fully waterproof construction (including elastic panels), with sealed seams.Synthetic insulation is warm and lightweight.Removable sheepskin footbed provides warmth and comfort.Supportive midsole includes a heel insert to absorb impacts.Lined with premium leather.Extra set of footbeds included.These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size.
